DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess length hospital stay perioperative complication patient undergo daVinci Robot-assisted sacrocolpopexy , one-year time period , complete questionnaire post-operative recovery .
DOC.brief_title: Robotic Urogynecological Surgery : Hospital Stay Perioperative Complications
DOC.criteria: The first 21 woman underwent DaVinciassisted robotic sacrocolpopexy complete postoperative QA questionnaires 09/01/2007 09/01/2008 . Any woman meet inclusion criterion .
